Params: {1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory73.jpg'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStoryNew/FxUiHitNew.prefab', 2: '2'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStoryNew/FxUiStoryWhiteNew.prefab', 2: '3'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Watanabe', 3: '(Takes down the guard) ...', 4: '1'}
{3: 'Inside the shell of the guard is a Forsaken pendant, the string that holds it already snapped.'}
{1: '1', 2: '??', 3: 'Your technique is impressive...', 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Watanabe', 3: '(Stares at the mechanoid head calmly) ...', 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: '??', 3: '...Few have entered this place by only taking down a dozen of my guards.', 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Watanabe', 3: 'What... are you?', 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: '??', 3: 'Relax. I am only here because you got me curious.', 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Watanabe', 3: 'Enough with your tricks. Show your face if you want to talk!', 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: '??', 3: 'You misunderstood. You are not worthy to talk to me.', 4: '1'}
{2: '??', 3: 'From how you react to that pendant, I can tell you are no threat.', 4: '1'}
{2: '??', 3: 'And you might not be finding what you are looking for. Am I right?', 4: '1'}
{2: '??', 3: 'Your chances too low. Your clues too few.', 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: '??', 3: 'Oh, by the wayâ€”please continue this assassination technique of yours. I must take a closer look at it once I am done with what I am doing. It may... come in handy.', 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 3: 'Watanabe stares at the mechanoid head for a while before realizing that whoever has been talking is long gone.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Watanabe', 3: 'What the hell... What kind of trick is that...', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Watanabe', 3: "(Clutches the pendant) Whatever. I'm running out of time...", 4: '1'}
